comment.author: 39839593@N00
comment._content: Cornmarket Street with the Saxon Tower of St. Michaels at the North Gate. Present-day view from Google. The tower dates from 1040 and is the oldest building in Oxford.

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content:
Michiel2005: I'm impressed - the unidentified tower in our photo turned out to be the oldest building in Oxford, isn't that great!  Now I can improve the information in our photo database, thanks to your swift identification. :) 
/Anna B.
